name: Cargo Embargo - UOG 2021 Games Jam Entry
name_original: Cargo Embargo - UOG 2021 Games Jam Entry
description:
USE WASD, EQ & your mouse to control your spaceship.

Use the right mouse button to fire weapons.

Fly around a randomly generated asteroid field in the search for three glowing cubes. The initial plan was to give the player the challenge of organizing their inventory by changing the orientation of items to fit into a grid more efficiently (a bit like Tetris). But unfortunately, this was a one-man project for a 2-day game jam and I did not get around to creating this fundamental feature. This current version of the project is however a good demonstration of the other areas of the game. AKA the ship is pretty fun just to fly around. 

Created by Tim Metcalf Games Design at the University of Gloucestershire.
